channel.title: 2 Client Questions
channel.description:
I didn't know were to put these so I put them here. I have to problems with my client, both I can deal with but it would be nice to fix.
1. I used welshscape for my client base and I wanted to know if its possible to remove the fire or add another 3D animation in there possibly useing a .gif format (Macromedia Flash)
2. I want to change the color of the loader bar which I'm sure can be done but I'm bot good with clients.
Help is appreciated and as a reminder, I am trying to put out a coding team for ZezumaScape.
Thanks in advance- RXVL/Death

item.title: 2 Client Questions
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
